metadata.title: CVE-2019-11842 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Matrix Sydent before 1.0.3 and Synapse before0.99.3.1. Random number generation is mishandled, which makes it easier forattackers to predict a Sydent authentication token or a Synapse random ID.

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
